reuters.title: DEKALB <DKLBB.O> SELLS HEINOLD HOG MARKET
reuters.body:
Dekalb Corp said it sold its Heinold Hog Market Inc to the unit's employees through an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP). Terms were not disclosed, but president Bruce Bickner said the sale will have a positive, but not substantial, impact on DeKalb as a whole. The company said the hog marketing unit did not fit with its strategy of investing in its core businesses.
Reuter 
